lexa.core.data.formatting

Interface Format<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - any type of object
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanFormat, CombinedDateTimeFormat, DateTimeFormat, DoubleFormat, IntegerFormat, LongFormat, StringFormat

    public interface Format<T>
    An interface for the classes that provide formatting for serialising and deserialising data.
    Since:
    2013-08
    Author:
    William

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T fromString(java.lang.String string)
      Parse a string to get the value
      java.lang.String toString(T value)
      Formats a value as a string.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString(T value)
        Formats a value as a string.

        The formatted string this returns should will in an equal object when calling fromString(String).

        Formally: 

        value.equals(this.fromString(this.toString(value) == true
        Parameters:
        value - a value to be formatted
        Returns:
        a value as a string

      • fromString

        T fromString(java.lang.String string)
        Parse a string to get the value
        Parameters:
        string - a string to parse
        Returns:
        the value held by string if it can be parsed, otherwise null.
